mapper.insert: insert into parent(m_no, k_no, c_no) values(#{mVo.mNo}, #{kVo.kNo}, #{cVo.cNo})
mapper.select: select * from parent p join member m on p.m_no=m.m_no where p.m_no=#{mNo};
select * from parent p join `member` m on p.m_no=m.m_no join class c on p.c_no=c.c_no where p.m_no=#{mNo} and p.k_no=#{kNo}
select * from parent p join member m on p.m_no=m.m_no join class c on p.c_no=c.c_no where p.k_no=#{kNo};
